duration_raw: until the next time you make your daily preparations
markdown:
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 332 4.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Deities** [Droskar](/Deities.aspx?ID=28), [Droskar](/Deities.aspx?ID=28), [Lissala](/Deities.aspx?ID=156), [The Godclaw](/Deities.aspx?ID=198), [Zura](/Deities.aspx?ID=83) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Range** 30 feet **Target** 1 creature **Saving Throw** Will **Duration** until the next time you make your daily preparations --- You take command of the target, forcing it to obey your orders. If you issue an obviously self-destructive order, the target doesn't act until you issue a new order. The effect depends on its Will save. **Critical Success** The target is unaffected.
**Success** The target is [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) as it fights off your commands.
**Failure** You control the target. It gains the [controlled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=6) condition, but it can attempt a Will save at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the spell ends.
**Critical Failure** As a failure, but the target receives a new save only if you give it a new order that is against its nature, such as killing its allies. --- **Heightened (10th)** The duration is unlimited.
name: Dominate

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

 

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Will

**Duration** until the next time you make your daily preparations
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
A creature must obey your orders.
</summary>
summary: A creature must obey your orders.
summary_markdown: A creature must obey your orders.
text: Dominate Source Core Rulebook pg. 332 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deities Droskar, Droskar, Lissala, The Godclaw, Zura Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 30 feet Target 1 creature Saving Throw Will Duration until the next time you make your daily preparations --- You take command of the target, forcing it to obey your orders. If you issue an obviously self-destructive order, the target doesn't act until you issue a new order. The effect depends on its Will save. Critical Success The target is unaffected. Success The target is stunned 1 as it fights off your commands. Failure You control the target. It gains the controlled condition, but it can attempt a Will save at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the spell ends. Critical Failure As a failure, but the target receives a new save only if you give it a new order that is against its nature, such as killing its allies. --- Heightened (10th) The duration is unlimited.
